attributes.action: Reduce Traffic Speed to 20 mph on Cedar Road
attributes.additional_details:
Cedar Road is a small road linking Mawney Road and North Street in Romford, these roads are major roads connecting Romford Town Center to the A12 and the M25.

Cedar Road is used as a rat run during the rush hour with drivers using excessive speed. The road is dangerous for pedestrians as the road is double parked.

It is just a matter of time before a serious accident occurs.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local borough council.
